name: snowball
actor_no_arg: You look around for snow to make a snowball with.
others_no_arg: $n looks around for some snow to pack a snowball with.
actor_found_target: You throw a snowball in $N's face.
others_found: $n conjures a snowball from the thin air and throws it at $N.
target_found: $n conjures a snowball from the thin air and throws it at you.
actor_auto: You stand with the snowball in your hand because your victim is not here.
others_auto: $n conjures a snowball out of the thin air and throws it at $mself.
